tool.name: OTB.ConvertSensorToGeoPoint
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayin False output_data_output.idx $output_data_output.idx output_data_output.idy $output_data_output.idy output_data_output.town $output_data_output.town output_data_output.country $output_data_output.country name OTB.ConvertSensorToGeoPoint in $in input.idx $input.idx input.idy $input.idy prefer $prefer response $response transmissionMode_output.idx $OutputSection_output.idx.transmissionMode_output.idx transmissionMode_output.idy $OutputSection_output.idy.transmissionMode_output.idy transmissionMode_output.town $OutputSection_output.town.transmissionMode_output.town transmissionMode_output.country $OutputSection_output.country.transmissionMode_output.country

param.name: in
param.label: Input sensor image.
param.help: Input sensor image. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, jpeg, tiff

param.name: input.idx
param.label: X coordinate of the point to transform.
param.help: X coordinate of the point to transform.

param.name: input.idy
param.label: Y coordinate of the point to transform.
param.help: Y coordinate of the point to transform.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_output.idx
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_output.idy
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_output.town
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_output.country
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: This Application converts a sensor point of an input image to a geographic point using the Forward Sensor Model of the input image.
